titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2608.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2608.

action.text: Mr. Rogers (KY) asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 2608 (Continuing Appropriations Act, 2012).
